TestCase.name: NoGroupByNoCountAggSingleMode
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_no_group_no_count_single as select sum(v1) as V from t

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_no_group_no_count_single]) RwStreamProject(v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $1)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($0)]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1])

TestCase.name: NoGroupByHasCountAggSingleMode
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_no_group_has_count_single as select Count(*), Sum(v1) as V from t

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_no_group_has_count_single]) RwStreamProject(EXPR$0=[$0], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $2)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], EXPR$0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($0)]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1])

TestCase.name: HasGroupByHasCountAggSingleMode
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_group_has_count_single as select v2, Count(*), Sum(v1) as V from t group by v2

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_has_group_has_count_single]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], v=[$3]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], EXPR$1=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v2,v1])

TestCase.name: HasGroupByNoCountAggSingleMode
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_group_no_count_single as select v2, Sum(v1) as V from t group by v2

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_has_group_no_count_single]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], v=[$2]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v2,v1])
